amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 116-289 to require Agency employees to make available appropriate inclusion and diversity training and retraining to ensure employees understand the specific challenges facing minority- and women- owned businesses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 116-289 to require Agency employees to make available appropriate inclusion and diversity training and retraining to ensure employees understand the specific challenges facing minority- and women- owned businesses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Brown (MD).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
